meanings.definition: A person who has had a limb removed by surgery or trauma.
meanings.sent1: Many amputees use prosthetic limbs to help them walk.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a support group for amputees to share their experiences.

meanings.sent4: In a world full of obstacles, amputees show incredible strength in overcoming challenges.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the daily struggles faced by amputees.
